channel.title: Setting Variables
channel.description:
I dont know what to set path or classpath to i jacked up my comp (XP)
I got java 1.6.0_07 i believe i downloaded java :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2008, 01:00:50 pm[/size][hr]Also this is my path and classpath
path: %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Ulead Systems\MPEG;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\
CLASSPATH: .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

item.title: Setting Variables
item.dc:creator: @empir3 empir3
item.description:
@empir3 wrote:

what should i change compiler and runserver thing now to like edit then change what or replace?

Also client doesnt work now it pop up real fast and exits

Read full topic

item.title: Setting Variables
item.dc:creator: @Tredog Tredog
item.description:
@Tredog wrote:

Classpath put this

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path put this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Read full topic
